abstract: The company said the investigation was a result of a voluntary internal review of its global anticorruption practices along with information “from other sources.”
snippet: The company said the investigation was a result of a voluntary internal review of its global anticorruption practices along with information “from other sources.”
lead_paragraph: Wal-Mart said in a filing Thursday that it might have violated the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act and that it had begun an internal investigation, hired outside counsel and alerted the Justice Department and the Securities and Exchange Commission.
